name: Stay Human (DanielM40)
description:
Controls:

WASD - Movement

Mouse - Look around

Left mouse button - Shoot

E - Inject yourself (lose health but increase damage)

Description:

You are on the run from a deadly militia, there is no way out.

You stole a work-in-progress medicine that can increase your power but at what cost.

Fight endless hoards of robots and see how long you can last

Notes:

This was made for the mini-game jam 110: Sacrifice

This is a work in progress and I hope you enjoy it.

Please give any feedback no matter how small.

Thank you

Menu Music from: https://www.FesliyanStudios.com

Assets from: https://itch.io/game-assets/free
